price: 107. Yalli ama korosuh tirtó faxinnay tirri ken haak yeneeh usun agleytit kaat haak manannon, Nabiyow ken taamoomih dacayrit koo mahanninooy atu ken caagiidaa kee ken Rizqhih Awlaytuh (abbah) matanto.
arabic: وَلَوۡ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ مَآ أَشۡرَكُواْۗ وَمَا جَعَلۡنَٰكَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ حَفِيظٗاۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيۡهِم بِوَكِيلٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: walaw shāa al-lahu mā ashrakū wamā jaʿalnāka ʿalayhim ḥafīẓan wamā anta ʿalayhim biwakīlin
